title: Wasn't the point of Nidalee's rework last year to make her reliant on the Hunt
body: Instead, it means free resets and an execute, on top of everything she already had. I could've sworn Riot planned it to be more "hit spear, go in" type thing, and it kinda is, but there is still way too much safety for that kind of damage.

replies.body: She still has a 0 cost, low cooldown escape and a heal. As long as those things are in her kit, she's gonna be annoying as hell to deal with.
